Articles.Content:
Here's the scenario: You go to bed and the next morning, you wake up and you are inside the video game you last played. So, how screwed are you?

 

I'll start: Jedi: Survivor

How screwed am I?: As long as I'm not an enemy or important to the plot, I'm fine!

Kerbal Space Program:
As long as I'm the director or support crew I'm safe.
Outer Worlds.  Those stupid Canids are gonna be the death of me.

Path of Titans

how screwed? Dead. I mean come on, dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures from every epoch that had them and no way to get back to modern times? 
172501162024
Worldbox. I am absolutely done for. Nice knowing you, guys.

OK, I'll play

Balder's Gate 3... And I am seriously done for because I woke up and I'm a scribe!!!  A scribe???  Seriously???  All I have to fight with is a feather quill pen???

@Just Jim dont under estimate feather allergies  

still dead lol still path of titans

064901172024

Fallout

Too many attempts with the screwedriver.

Spoiler

Minecraft.

If I'm careful when in the caves, fighting mobs, and trying to do water bucket clutches, I should be fine.

Edited January 17 by TwoCalories

Hehe 

I only played Minion Rush yesterday. I guess I'd better start running.

DCS.

I still don't know how to do it; I only have basic knowledge of keeping a plane in the air. I'd say I'm pretty screwed.
this Itch game called Adventures with Anxiety. I guess i'm screwed now...

Project Wingman.

I'm probally dying 100 times at Yellowstone, Bering Strait and Presidia.

Edited January 30 by Abel Military Services
So, this morning I would have woken up inside NHL 2020.  Considering I can't skate or shoot, I'd be pretty hosed if they put me on the lineup and made me take even a single shift.

reviving the thread

Splatoon 3: side order is pain.

Hardspace ShipBreaker. As long as I dont breach my suit while breaking ships down Ill be just fine. Even in the event of suit breach if I can reach my habs front porch there is a kiosk from LYNX my employer that sells consumables (O2, thruster fuel, tethers, medkits, democharges and suit patch kits) i can fix my suit so ill be fine.

183302272024
StarCraft II. As long as I'm a main character on the winning side, I should be fine. Otherwise, I'm screwed.

Subnautica depends what area im in. If im at my primary base? Kinda screwed if i cant cure this alien disease. If im down in the inactive lava zone? Dead.

064806152024
Garry's Mod. I AM GOD HERE!

Project Zomboid.

Doesn't matter who I am.. eventually screwed.

Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown

If I'm the average person, I'd say I'd have a roughly 50-50 chance of survival depending on where I live. If I live in Osea, for instance, I'd have a near 100% chance of survival. If I live anywhere in Usea, I'd probably get killed by a stray missile from a fighter jet participating in one of the like 15 wars they have there every second.

If I'm a main character, I'm invincible because of the plot. That's that.

On 6/20/2024 at 12:33 AM, TwoCalories said:

Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown

If I'm the average person, I'd say I'd have a roughly 50-50 chance of survival depending on where I live. If I live in Osea, for instance, I'd have a near 100% chance of survival. If I live anywhere in Usea, I'd probably get killed by a stray missile from a fighter jet participating in one of the like 15 wars they have there every second.

If I'm a main character, I'm invincible because of the plot. That's that.

How about being Pixy? 

"IT'S TIME"

mirror's edge: catalyst

I'll probably be fine.

KSP

I guess I'll be fine because I installed a state-of-the-art auto defence system in KSC.

Msfs2020 flying the 777-300er. Uh if i was on my last flight i did? Bruised and battered from a wildly unstable approach to KJFK and a high speed landing with a very hard braking (made 12 of 18 brake rotors glow red at north of 1000°F. But overall not very… until the chief pilot excoriates me lol.
